name: Voxel Tanks
description: Voxel Tanks - hardcore and dynamic top-down arena shooter with voxel graphics and chiptune music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 1.7 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 128 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 128 MB available space
